definition: to hand over/to pass on sth/to gradually increase or decrease/progressively

sentences.english: The paper examines the history of General Education in American universities.
sentences.chinese: 本文考察了美国大学通识教育的历史递嬗。

definition: to flourish then decline/rise and fall
to ebb and rise/to decrease and then grow
evolution of sth over time/course of development/history
lit. the Big Dipper 北斗星[Bei3 dou3 xing1] has turned and the stars have moved/time flies/also written 斗轉星移|斗转星移[Dou3 zhuan3 xing1 yi2]
to continue the same old routine/to carry on just as before/to procrastinate
natural phenomena of a seasonal nature
prosperity and decline (of a kingdom)/rise and fall
to flow and change/development and change (of society)
to flourish and decay/rise and fall
the passage of the years/the flow of time
